member.name: M:weatherApp.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: A summary of the weather forecast for a given location.
member.response: Returns a forecast summary for the location specified.
If the request url is invalid or parameters are incorrect or no matching location found.
If the request is unauthorized e.g. apiKey is missing or invalid.
If the apiKey has has exceeeded usage limit or has been disabled.
